statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 8 \\ -11 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ -4 \\ 28 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -5 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 8 \\ -11 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ -4 \\ 28 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
